trigger: Furnace filter missing or severely clogged
action_item: Install new filter with appropriate MERV rating. Confirm airflow is restored and document in job file.
documentation: Photo of new filter, product details, and inspection note.
policy_text: Proper air filtration is required for safe and efficient HVAC operation.

action_item: Seal, reconnect, or cap duct as required. Confirm all ducts deliver/return air to conditioned space.
documentation: Photo of corrected duct, airflow test notes.
policy_text: Ducts must be continuous and sealed to maintain comfort, efficiency, and safety.

trigger: Air handler intake open to crawlspace or attic
action_item: Seal all return paths and install sealed plenum as needed. Do not allow unfiltered or unconditioned air to enter system.
policy_text: HVAC intakes must be sealed from crawl/attic to prevent moisture, dust, and contaminants.

trigger: Mechanical system coated in unknown black mastic/adhesive
action_item: Flag for HVAC contractor remediation and evaluation. Do not proceed until verified safe or remediated.
documentation: Photo of coating, contractor report, clearance documentation.
policy_text: Unapproved materials on HVAC equipment must be reviewed for safety and compliance.
